mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(contact_seq) FROM tb_contact WHERE contact_open = 'N') AS contact_noread_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(contact_seq) FROM tb_contact) AS contact_total, (SELECT COUNT(device_seq) FROM tb_device WHERE device_status = 'Y') AS device_use_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(device_seq) FROM tb_device WHERE device_status IN ('Y', 'N')) AS device_total, (SELECT COUNT(sbs_seq) FROM tb_subscription WHERE TRUNC(sbs_end_dt) <= TRUNC(sysdate) + INTERVAL '5' DAY AND sbs_status != 'Y' ) AS sbs_dday, (SELECT COUNT(sbs_seq) FROM tb_subscription) AS sbs_total FROM dual
